entry.title: Monday: Rain or snow. High 6.

entry.title: Monday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Rain changing to flurries overnight. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm except 25 mm near Fernie. Local snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the morning with 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 13 March 2023
